abstract_summ: We established a method to estimate instant case fatality rate and cure rate of COVID-19 in China.Conclusion The instant case fatality rate of COVID-19 in China was much higher than that in China except Hubei.In this study, the actual number of COVID-19 cases in Iran was estimated based on the mortality model in 4 scenarios.While, the case fatality rate was 1.0±0.4% in China except Hubei.The case fatality rate of COVID-19 in China was underestimated.
title_summ: Estimated cases based on CFR in different scenarios and some lessons from early case fatality rate of coronavirus disease 2019 in IranEstimating instant case fatality rate of COVID-19 in ChinaPredicting the Epidemiological Outbreak of the Coronavirus Disease 2019 (COVID-19) in Saudi ArabiaEarly estimation of the case fatality rate of COVID-19 in mainland China: a data-driven analysis.Corona Epidemic in Indian context: Predictive Mathematical ModellingEstimation of instant case fatality rate of COVID-19 in Wuhan and Hubei based on daily case notification dataRisk estimation of the SARS-CoV-2 acute respiratory disease outbreak outside ChinaCan judgments according to case fatality rate be correct all the time during epidemics?Dataset on the COVID-19 Pandemic Situation in Tunisia with application to SIR ModelA deductive approach to modeling the spread of COVID-19Estimation of SARS-CoV-2 mortality during the early stages of an epidemic: a modelling study in Hubei, China and northern ItalyEstimating the case fatality ratio of the COVID-19 epidemic in ChinaCharacterizing key attributes of the epidemiology of COVID-19 in China: Model-based estimationsThe Epidemiology of COVID-19 and applying Non Pharmaceutical interventions by using the Susceptible, Infectious Recovered epidemiological Model in Pakistan.Estimating the risk of COVID-19 death during the course of the outbreak in Korea, February-March, 2020Estimation of global case fatality rate of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) using meta-analyses: Comparison between calendar date and days since the outbreak of the first confirmed case.Epidemiological characteristics of the first 53 laboratory-confirmed cases of COVID-19 epidemic in Hong Kong, 13 February 2020
title_abstract_phrases: Estimation of instant case fatality rate of COVID-19 in Wuhan and Hubei based on daily case notification dataBackground The outbreak of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) initially appeared and has most rapidly spread in Wuhan, China.Estimated cases based on CFR in different scenarios and some lessons from early case fatality rate of coronavirus disease 2019 in IranBackground: The new Coronavirus disease (COVID-19) was first identified in China in 2019.Conclusion The instant case fatality rate of COVID-19 in China was much higher than that in China except Hubei.Estimating the case fatality ratio of the COVID-19 epidemic in ChinaBackground: Corona Virus Disease 2019 (COVID-19) due to severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) emerged in Wuhan city and rapidly spread throughout China since late December 2019.We established a method to estimate instant case fatality rate and cure rate of COVID-19 in China.
